title: FS: Shibe Park postcard (1911 copyright date)

posts.post_title: FS: Shibe Park postcard (1911 copyright date)
posts.post_content:
Nice early Shibe Park postcard which has some light corner and surface wear and is free of any major damage. Asking $65 shipped. Please PM or post with any questions (in the case of purchase I will go with the first PM received over post).

Thanks!
